# Autogenerated Types

This folder contains automatically generated type definitions from OpenAPI specifications.

## Generating Types

Types can be regenerated using the `@hey-api/openapi-ts` package with Zod schema support.

### EntityCore Types

```bash
npx @hey-api/openapi-ts -p zod -i https://staging.openbraininstitute.org/api/entitycore/openapi.json -o "./src/lib/tools/autogenerated_types/entitycore"
```

### OBIOne Types

```bash
npx @hey-api/openapi-ts -p zod -i https://staging.openbraininstitute.org/api/obi-one/openapi.json -o "./src/lib/tools/autogenerated_types/obione"
```

### Thumbnail Generation Types

```bash
npx @hey-api/openapi-ts -p zod -i https://staging.openbraininstitute.org/api/thumbnail-generation/openapi.json -o "./src/lib/tools/autogenerated_types/thumbnail_generation"
```

## Notes

- These types are generated from external API specifications and should not be manually edited
- Regenerate types when the upstream API specifications change
- The `-p zod` flag generates Zod schemas for runtime validation
- Adjust the output path (`-o`) based on your current working directory
